item.title: Achievements
item.description: The achievements below are written in third person: â€¢ Running and maintaining three websites. The websites have gathered more than 2,00,000 page views till date with Quizzr being the most successful one. Also a publisher of GOOGLE ADSENSE since 2016.: Quizzr ( https://www.quizzr.tech/ ): Quizzr is a blog for all the quizzing enthusiasts. Questions and answers of famous quizzes are posted to quench quizzing thirst of the readers. BitCoin Price (Shut Down in May 2018.
